overview.status_summary: CRITICAL: Foundational infrastructure is completely broken - nothing functions, test suite is non-operational, and all domains have critical implementation bugs
overview.reality_check: Previous 44% assessment was completely wrong. Actual state: test infrastructure broken, entities have critical bugs, repositories don't work, no functioning domain logic
blocking_issues: Jest test configuration completely broken - cannot run any tests
Test infrastructure missing proper path configuration
Import errors throughout test files prevent test execution
UserEntity.updateUser() doesn't preserve created date - data corruption bug
UserEntity.updateUser() doesn't update modified date - stale timestamp bug
UserRepository import errors: ScanCommand from wrong module
UserRepository pagination likely broken due to import issues
OrganizationEntity missing updateOrganization method - incomplete implementation
RepositoryEntity completely missing - entire domain non-functional
RepositoryRepository completely missing - entire domain non-functional
GSI3SK timestamp generation bug breaks all temporal queries
No shared validation utilities - data integrity at risk
All service layers empty - no business logic
All route layers empty - no API functionality

Shared utilities - missing validation and error handling

entity_data_integrity.description: UserEntity.updateUser has critical date handling bugs that corrupt data
bugs: Uses this.created instead of opts.created || this.created - loses original creation date
Doesn't set modified: new Date() - leaves stale modification timestamps
These bugs likely exist in all entity update methods
entity_data_integrity.impact: Data corruption in production - created dates will be overwritten, modified dates won't update

repository_imports.description: Repository classes have wrong imports that prevent functionality
bugs: UserRepository imports ScanCommand from client-dynamodb instead of lib-dynamodb
This likely breaks all scanning/pagination functionality
Other repositories probably have similar import issues
repository_imports.impact: Repository operations will fail at runtime with import/type errors

schema_timestamp_bug.description: GSI3SK timestamp generated at schema definition time, not record creation
schema_timestamp_bug.impact: All repository records will have identical GSI3SK values, breaking temporal queries
schema_timestamp_bug.required_fix: Generate timestamps at record creation time, not schema definition
